verses.verse: O <S%H430>God<s%>, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>; I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and give <S%H2167>praise<s%>, even with my <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto you among the <S%H3816>nations<s%>.
For your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: and your <S%H571>truth<s%> reaches unto the <S%H7834>clouds<s%>.
Be you <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: and your <S%H3519>glory<s%> above all the <S%H776>earth<s%>;
That your <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered<s%>: <S%H3467>save<s%> with your right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and answer <S%H6030>me<s%>.

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>; I will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>, I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and measure <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is <S%H4519>mine<s%>; Manasseh is <S%H669>mine<s%>; Ephraim also is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%>;
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is my <S%H7366>washpot<s%>; over <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I cast <S%H7993>out<s%> my <S%H5275>shoe<s%>; over <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> will I <S%H7321>triumph<s%>.
Who will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? who will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me into <S%H123>Edom<s%>?
Will not <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, who have cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>? and will not <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, go <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>hosts<s%>?
<S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> from <S%H6862>trouble<s%>: for <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>: for he it is that shall tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>enemies<s%>.
